meanings.definition: A group of large carnivorous dinosaurs belonging to the family Tyrannosauridae.
meanings.sent1: The tyrannosaurids roamed the ancient lands.
meanings.sent2: Many museums display skeletons of tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurids threw a birthday party for the T-Rex.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dinosaurs, the tyrannosaurids were the kings.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about the fearsome tyrannosaurids.

meanings.definition: The tyrannosaurids were known for their large size and powerful jaws.
meanings.sent1: Visitors gasped in awe at the massive tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists study the teeth of tyrannosaurids to understand their diet.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurids challenged each other to a jaw strength competition.
meanings.sent4: The power of the tyrannosaurids' jaws could crush bones effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the impressive skulls of tyrannosaurids.

meanings.definition: Scientists have discovered several species of tyrannosaurids in North America.
meanings.sent1: The discovery of new tyrannosaurids excites researchers.
meanings.sent2: North America was once home to diverse tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurids in North America threw a parade for the new arrivals.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the fossils of tyrannosaurids reveals their unique features.
meanings.sent5: The hunt for more species of tyrannosaurids continues in the Badlands.

meanings.definition: The tyrannosaurids lived during the Late Cretaceous period.
meanings.sent1: During the Late Cretaceous, the tyrannosaurids ruled the land.
meanings.sent2: The Late Cretaceous was a time of dominance for tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurids in the Late Cretaceous threw a costume party.
meanings.sent4: In the Late Cretaceous, the tyrannosaurids were the ultimate predators.
meanings.sent5: Children enjoy imagining the world of tyrannosaurids in the Late Cretaceous.

meanings.definition: Fossils of tyrannosaurids have provided valuable information about the behavior and anatomy of these dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: Paleontologists carefully study the fossils of tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent2: The behavior of tyrannosaurids can be inferred from fossil evidence.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurids' fossils told stories of their daily lives.
meanings.sent4: Examining the anatomy of tyrannosaurids reveals their incredible adaptations.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit educates visitors on the discoveries from tyrannosaurids' fossils.
